channel.title: Comments on: The Bizzaro Blizzard World

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description: Him and the rest of the ex-EQ circlejerk buddies seeping into Blizzard.
item.content:encoded: Him and the rest of the ex-EQ circlejerk buddies seeping into Blizzard.

item.title: By: Anubus
item.dc:creator: Anubus
item.description: Furor needs to go, SERIOUSLY. It's like having a dog that keeps craping on the carpet in your house and no matter how many times you yell at him for it, or wack him in the nose for it, <strong>he just keeps fucking doing it</strong>. He just doesn't get it.
item.content:encoded: Furor needs to go, SERIOUSLY. It’s like having a dog that keeps craping on the carpet in your house and no matter how many times you yell at him for it, or wack him in the nose for it, he just keeps fucking doing it. He just doesn’t get it.
